definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: Ms. priority is a well-known code of conduct.
sentences.chinese: 女士优先是一个人人皆知的行为准则。

sentences.english: I've heard that Englishmen are all very gentlemanly . They always give women preferential treatment.
sentences.chinese: 听说英国男人都很绅士，什么都是女士优先。
你懂不懂什么叫做女士优先？

sentences.english: " Hard to me. Lady's first. " --- Wine.
sentences.chinese: 难为我吧你，你先来，女士优先。

sentences.english: A : Lady first. You can climb now.
sentences.chinese: 对不起先生，我想你一定知道女士优先吧。

sentences.english: Appreciate this American man insists through the behavior method of the lady first.
sentences.chinese: 欣赏这位美国男士贯彻女士优先的行为方式。

sentences.english: Lady first. You can climb now.
sentences.chinese: 女士优先，现在你就可以出发了。

definition: in order of arrival/first come, first served
respect the old and cherish the young
nobody will find fault with extra courtesy (idiom)/courtesy costs nothing
a real man doesn't fight with womenfolk (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 nan2 bu4 gen1 nu:3 dou4

definition: to give up one's seat for sb
men and women should not touch hands when they give or receive things (citation, from Mencius)
pinyin: nan2 nu:3 shou4 shou4 bu4 qin1

definition: a gentleman uses his mouth and not his fist
pinyin: jun1 zi3 dong4 kou3 bu4 dong4 shou3

definition: to respect the wise and venerate the worthy (idiom); to honor the great and the good
What you don't want done to you, don't do to others. (idiom, from the Confucian analects)/Do as you would be done by./Do not do to others what you would not have them do to you.
pinyin: ji3 suo3 bu4 yu4 , wu4 shi1 yu2 ren2

definition: lit. proper behavior is based on reciprocity (idiom)/fig. to return politeness for politeness
